name: ai-programming-expert
description: Advanced AI Programming Expert Platform - 60+ Features, Online/Offline/Hybrid

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd web && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd web && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd web && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd web && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd web && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"

author: AI Programming Expert Team
